name: Galactic Space Force
description:
An action-packed game that is reminiscent of the great arcade games of the past. Randomly spawned enemies and power-ups to ensure that no two games are exactly the same for a new experience every time you play.

• The old arcade-style in brought to the palm of your hand
• Power-ups that can help or hinder you
• Randomly spawned enemy locations so no two games are the same
• Simple and Easy to Play
• High-quality images optimized for tablets and large screens.

Supports:

Mouse and Keyboard

Full Controller

TouchScreen Controls for touchscreen devices

Controls:

Keyboard:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot: Space or Left Click

Controller:

Move: Dpad

Shoot: X(playstation) or A(Xbox)

Touchscreen:

Move: on screen arrow buttons

Shoot on screen A button
